chart.title: Views over time (last 7 days)
chart.searchString: index=_internal source=*web_access.log* /app/ | rex "GET /[^/]+/app/(?<app_view>[^/ ?]+/[^/ ?]+) " | search app_view=* | timechart span=1h count by app_view

table.title: Popular views (last 7 days)
table.searchString: index=_internal source=*web_access.log* /app/ | rex "GET /[^/]+/app/(?<app_view>[^/ ?]+/[^/ ?]+) " | search app_view=* | top 1000 app_view

chart.title: UI activity by user
chart.searchString: search index="_internal" source="*splunkd_access.log" "/services/search/jobs" | kv access-extractions | search uri=/services/search/jobs/* user!="-"| rex (?<run_time>\d+)ms$ | timechart eval(sum(run_time)/1000) by user

table.title: Average splunkd Latency per Search Job Endpoint Type (last 24 hours)
table.searchString: search index="_internal" source="*splunkd_access.log" "/services/search/jobs" | kv access-extractions | search uri=/services/search/jobs/* user!="-"| rex (?<run_time>\d+)ms$ | eval file = if(file = "summary" OR file = "timeline" OR file = "control" OR file = "results_preview" OR file = "results" OR file = "events", file, "job") | chart avg(run_time) as "Avg. Latency (ms)" perc95(run_time) as "95th Percentile Latency (ms)" count by file | rename file as "Endpoint Type"
